pages.text: $(li)The Spider Dungeon is a structure that can be found near of the surface of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Here, you can find a big quantity of $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spiders$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cave_spider)Cave Spiders$(/l).$(br)$(li)Some interesting $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) can be found here, so it is a good place to explore.
